title: How are my campaigns performing today?

messages.content: How are my campaigns performing today?

Here's your campaign performance overview for today:

## **Campaign Performance Summary**

| Campaign | Budget | Spend | Pacing | Health | Impressions | Clicks | CTR | Conversions | CPA |
|----------|--------|-------|--------|--------|-------------|--------|-----|-------------|-----|
| **Apex Motors** | $50,000 | $32,450 | Behind | ‚ö†Ô∏è Poor | 3.85M | 4,620 | 0.12% | 45 | $721.11 |
| **TechFlow SaaS** | $25,000 | $28,200 | Overspend | ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning | 890K | 5,340 | 0.60% | 89 | $316.85 |
| **SportMax Apparel** | $35,000 | $29,800 | On Track | ‚úÖ Good | 1.45M | 5,075 | 0.35% | 127 | $234.65 |
| **FinanceFirst Bank** | $40,000 | $22,100 | On Track | ‚úÖ Good | 720K | 2,520 | 0.35% | 36 | $613.89 |
| **GreenEnergy Co** | $20,000 | $14,900 | On Track | ‚úÖ Good | 1.12M | 3,920 | 0.35% | 56 | $266.07 |

## **Key Highlights:**

### üö® **Needs Attention:**
- **Apex Motors**: Behind pace with poor health. Mobile CTR (0.08%) significantly underperforming vs desktop (0.18%)
- **TechFlow SaaS**: Overspending by $3,200 (113% of budget). Strong CTR (0.60%) but needs budget controls

### ‚úÖ **Performing Well:**
- **SportMax Apparel**: On track with 85% video completion rate and solid CPA of $234.65
- **FinanceFirst Bank**: Strong viewability (85%) and on pace
- **GreenEnergy Co**: California region outperforming (0.40% CTR)

## **Recommended Actions:**
1. **Apex Motors**: Reduce mobile bid and shift budget to desktop
2. **TechFlow SaaS**: Set daily budget caps to prevent further overspend
3. **GreenEnergy Co**: Increase budget allocation to California

Would you like me to make any adjustments to these campaigns?

‚úÖ **SportMax Apparel campaign has been paused successfully.**

**What happened:**
- Campaign status changed from **active** ‚Üí **paused**
- Delivery has stopped completely - no further spend will occur
- All active ad serving has been halted

**Notifications sent:**
- ‚úâÔ∏è Email draft prepared for ta.khongsap@gmail.com and jasonliew@signal42.ai
- üí¨ Slack notification sent to #adcp-demo

The SportMax Apparel campaign has been removed from your active campaigns. You now have 4 remaining active campaigns (Apex Motors, TechFlow SaaS, FinanceFirst Bank, and GreenEnergy Co).

Would you like me to make any adjustments to your other campaigns?
